titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to give citizens of the United States the right to propose amendments to the Constitution by an initiative process.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 6/25/1997--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - States that the people shall have the right to propose amendments to the Constitution through an initiative process.
